column7: Description

Tom Driscoll wakes from the latest version of a disturbing dream aboard the Toronto, a corporate mining ship he's been server on, only to learn of a disturbing event he slept through involving his partner on an upcoming mission.

It is probably not a harbinger of what is to come, though, right?
